epochLength = 604800 seconds
creatorRewardFirstEpoch = 10

RELEASE EGL AT EPOCH:
---------------------
((rewardEpoch * epochLength) - (creatorRewardFirstEpoch * epochLength)) / ((52 - creatorRewardFirstEpoch) * epochLength)

(((10 * 604800) - (10 * 604800)) / ((52 - 10) * 604800))^4 * 750000000 = 0.000000000000

PROXIMITY BLOCK REWARD %
-------------------------
(actualDelta / eglDelta) * 75

(50000/100000) * 75 = 37.5
(89999/100000) * 75 = 67.49925
(1/100000) * 75 = 0.00075

TOTAL BLOCK REWARD %
---------------------
(actualDelta / eglDelta) * 75 + 25

(50000/100000) * 75 + 25 = 62.5
(89999/100000) * 75 + 25 = 92.49925
(1/100000) * 75 + 25 = 25.00075

BLOCK REWARD
-------------
(totalRewardPercent * (remainingPoolReward / 2500000)) / 100

(62.5 * (1250000000 / 2500000)) / 100 = 156.250
(92.49925 * ((1250000000 - 156.25) / 2500000)) / 100 = 462.496
(25.00075 * ((1250000000 - 156.25 - 231.248096094) / 2500000)) / 100 = 125.004

RELEASE EGL
------------
(_timeSinceOrigin - minLiquidityTokensLockup) / ((epochLength * 52) - minLiquidityTokensLockup))**4 * 750000000;

((6051600 - 6048000) / ((604800 * 52) - 6048000))^4 * 750000000 = 0.000000302570;
((8640000 - 6048000) / ((604800 * 52) - 6048000))^4 * 750000000 = 81312.4338550455
((17280000 - 6048000) / ((604800 * 52) - 6048000))^4 * 750000000 = 28671165.720172267
((31449600 - 6048000) / ((604800 * 52) - 6048000))^4 * 750000000 = 750000000
((31449599 - 6048000) / ((604800 * 52) - 6048000))^4 * 750000000 = 749999881.8972102


POOL TOKENS DUE
----------------
(totalSupporterPoolTokens * (min(currentEgl, supporterLastEgl) - supporterFirstEgl)) / (supporterLastEgl - supporterFirstEgl)

(90 * (120 - 110)) / (200 - 110) = 10
(320500802 * (285689000 - 103384112)) / (423884914 - 103384112) = 182304888
(718090 * (812114 - 94024)) / (812114 - 94024) = 718090
(490000 * (500000 - 10000)) / (500000 - 10000) = 490000


BONUS EGLS DUE
--------------
(lastEgl^4 - firstEgl^4) / ((81/128) * 10^27)

(175^4 - 0^4) / ((81/128) * 10^27) = 0.000000000000000001
(423884914^4 - 103384112^4) / ((81/128) * 10^27) = 50836694.14449182
(812114^4 - 94024^4) / ((81/128) * 10^27) = 0.0006872502419


VOTER REWARD
-------------
(voteWeight * 362844.70 * (52 - rewardEpoch)) / voterRewardSum

(40000 * 362844.70 * 52) / 112000 = 6738544.428571428

(40000 * 362844.70 * 52) / 112000 = 6738544.428571428
(40000 * 362844.70 * 51) / 112000 = 6608957.035714285
(40000 * 362844.70 * 50) / 112000 = 6479369.642857143

(40000 * 362844.70 * 48) / 112000 = 6220194.857142857
(40000 * 362844.70 * 47) / 112000 = 6090607.464285715
(40000 * 362844.70 * 46) / 112000 = 5961020.071428572
(40000 * 362844.70 * 45) / 112000 = 5831432.678571428

CLAIM BONUS EGLS
-----------------

0.1 * 428571428.571428571428571428 = 42857142.85714286
(42857142.85714286^4 - 0^4) / ((81/128) * 10^27) = 5331.1120366514
